name: taskmasterpro-backend
description: Backend for TaskMasterPro using tRPC, Express, and Prisma

scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 nodemon --watch src --ext ts,js --exec "node --loader ts-node/esm" src/server.ts
scripts.prisma:generate:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development dotenv -e .env.development npx prisma generate
scripts.prisma:generate:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production dotenv -e .env.production npx prisma generate
scripts.prisma:migrate:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development dotenv -e .env.development npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.prisma:migrate:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production dotenv -e .env.production npx prisma migrate deploy
